body_html:
Yes, the target is 1D. The issue is solved by adding a dimension to the target:

train_set = data_utils.TensorDataset(
    torch.from_numpy(df.as_matrix(['A', 'B'])).float(),
    torch.from_numpy(df.as_matrix(['C'])).float(),
)
body_text:
Yes, the target is 1D. The issue is solved by adding a dimension to the target:
train_set = data_utils.TensorDataset(
    torch.from_numpy(df.as_matrix(['A', 'B'])).float(),
    torch.from_numpy(df.as_matrix(['C'])).float(),

body:
Yes, the target is 1D. The issue is solved by adding a dimension to the target:
```
train_set = data_utils.TensorDataset(
    torch.from_numpy(df.as_matrix(['A', 'B'])).float(),
    torch.from_numpy(df.as_matrix(['C'])).float(),
)
```
